name: Piccle Ricc
description:
In Piccle Ricc you have to find weapons, healing supplies and fight your way out from forgotten place such this mystery dungeon!
Main objective of the game is to gather supplies, beat all enemies and escape from dungeon!Current features:
  • Hands on combat
  • Melee combat (including variety of weapons such as: sword, axe, etc.)
  • Custom inventory system
  • Pick up system
  • Players health
  • Players stamina
  • Aggressive A.I.
  • Dungeon
Features to come:
  • Co-Op Campaign
  • Free-for-all Multi-Player
  • Vehicles
